programme.title: This is Hockey

programme.title: This is Hockey

programme.title: This is Hockey
programme.desc: Modern day ice hockey played in Santiago can trace its origin to hockey-style games practiced by the indigenous Mapuche community since the 16th century.

programme.title: This is Hockey
programme.desc: Jamaica has exported a vibrant culture and is home to legendary athletes in all sports around the world, including the first Jamaican-born NHL player Graeme Townshend, and Karl Subban, father of PK, Malcolm, and Jordan, all drafted to the NHL.
